title: 日本ダービーの後に・前向きな言葉

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: --Mihono Bourbon has conquered the 2400m!
(Whaaaaaaa--!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haah, fuu, haah...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...! Sniff! I couldn't reach...!
Bourbon-san, again...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rice, I couldn't change...!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That's not true.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
You had leveled up significantly since the 'Satsuki Sho'.
I could definitely feel it through your mark.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: --I won't lose in the 'Kikuka Sho' either.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san...!
The audience cheers up at the conversation between the two.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower has been chasing after Bourbon all this time, huh.
Both of them ran an amazing race!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
The 'Kikuka Sho' is a long-distance race, right! This...
I'm looking forward to Rice Shower's performance!
Tokyo Racecourse's attention was completely captured by the first-place Mihono Bourbon and the unexpected rival, Rice Shower's presence.
Meanwhile, Matikanetannhauser--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Aha~, I guess this time I was just plain unlucky, you could say.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmm,
...I'm frustrated!
Matikanetannhauser is always serious, but for the once-in-a-lifetime 'Japanese Derby', she was especially fired up.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
--Because I'm plain and ordinary!
I'm not special at all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But, but but...
The possibility of winning is a different story.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because I don't want anything but first place either!
...But even so, you can't always get the ending you hope for.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's a race where you won't get another chance. So I still think, I absolutely have to win it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, that's why, that's exactly why...!
Matikanetannhauser looks down. Her shoulders shake, and her fists clench—
As if waiting for the tears to come, the surrounding cameras close in, but—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: What's important is the next one, the next!
Her face, lifted with vigor, had the same cheerful expression as usual.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because there's a next time! I'll use this as a lesson and give it my all!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, did you see Matikanetannhauser's press conference?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah, you know, I lost today too, so it really cheered me up.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: 'What's important is the next one, the next!' Hehe. I want to be able to say things like that too.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmph. So embarras~sing...!
Matikanetannhauser's forward-looking attitude and bright words touched the hearts of many people.
Next is the 'Kikuka Sho'. As always, I have no intention of losing.
